suppress.notes: CVE-2016-7051 is only relevant to jackson-dataformat-xml according to NVD [1] and original bug report [2]. [1] https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson-dataformat-xml/issues/211
CVE-2012-4232 is only valid for "a:jcore:jcore" JCore is not used within Ballerina.
CVE-2012-4231 is only valid for "a:jcore:jcore" JCore is not used within Ballerina.
CVE-2015-1193 is only valid for "paxtar" Debian package [1]. [1] https://bugs.debian.org/cgi-bin/bugreport.cgi?bug=774716
CVE-2015-1194 is only valid for "paxtar" Debian package [1]. [1] https://bugs.debian.org/cgi-bin/bugreport.cgi?bug=774716

CVE-2017-5645 is relevant for Apache Log4j 2.x before 2.8.2. Ballerina final distribution is not included this jar. Reported for : org.wso2.carbon.runtime.feature-5.2.0-m3.zip: org.ops4j.pax.logging.pax-logging-api-1.9.0.jar.
CVE-2010-4647 is only relevant to Eclipse IDE help content.
CVE-2008-7271 is only relevant to Eclipse IDE help content.
